resources.string: Allows the app to transfer your data via Bluetooth using the accessory framework.
This application can access the wearable device connection status.
The feedback that you send will appear here.
This will end your connection with %s.
Tap ASK AGAIN to ask additional questions related to those already posted.
Disconnect your band from the previous phone. In the Galaxy Wearable app on the previous phone, tap the menu drawer, then tap Disconnect.
See the battery level and more at a glance for your connected watch, band, or earbuds.
Control your watch, band, or buds with detailed settings.
Easily adjust the look and feel of your watch.
Tap here to install it. Your wearable devices may disconnect during the update.
Not supported for the current version of your phone software. Check for an update, then try again.
Read and agree to the following:
"Select the device or devices you're having a problem with. This helps us solve your problem more quickly."
The operating system on your phone has been modified in an unauthorized way, and is not compatible with the Samsung Gear app. Check your operating system and try again.
"Your device might not appear if it's connected to a different phone. Here's what to do:"
"Your device might not appear if it's connected to a different phone. %1$sGet help%2$s."
Sign in to your Samsung account first.
"Your SIM card country doesn't match your Samsung account country."

"Dear %1$s customers,
According to the service operation policy, %2$s does not support interworking with its mobile phones that will be released after 2021. This decision has been made based on the judgment that the existing service quality cannot be maintained through app update alone. Please be aware of this when changing your mobile phone in the future. If you have any further questions, please contact our call center(%3$shttp://samsung.com/support%4$s), Samsung members or %5$shttp://help.content.samsung.com%6$s and we'll take you through it. "
Galaxy Wearable will close to apply the update. Open it again after the update is complete.
Your phone will use this software to connect to your band.
Your phone will use this software to connect to your earbuds.
Your phone will use this software to connect to your watch.
Item at position %d cannot be dragged.
To connect, put the earbuds in your ears, then touch and hold both earbuds for 3 seconds until you hear a beep.
To connect your %s, put the earbuds in the case, then touch and hold both earbuds for 3 seconds until the light starts blinking red and green.
Unable to attach file. File already attached.
"Couldn't send error report. Select frequency of problem and try again."

"Be considerate and include important details so your consultation is helpful.
Don't enter your personal information.
Make sure the Send system log data option is selected.
You can attach a video or screenshot to make your issues easier to understand."
You need the plugin to control your band with the Galaxy Wearable app.
You need the plugin to control your earbuds with the Galaxy Wearable app.
You need the plugin to control your watch with the Galaxy Wearable app.
Select devices to remove from your phone.
"You'll need to reset any removed bands or watches before you can connect them to your phone again."
Maximum recording time reached %d seconds. Save recording and add it to attachment.
Unable to open %s in Maximum power saving mode.
Check your network connection, then try again.
Make sure the device you want to add is turned on.
Unable to send feedback. No text entered.
"Can't use %s. Delete some files or uninstall apps, then try again."
"This watch isn't supported on this phone."
"Your version of Android isn't compatible. Check for a software update for your phone and try again."
Check the number on your band
Check the number on your watch

"The following permissions are required for the app service.
Required permissions"
Location: Used to search for nearby wearable devices through Bluetooth
Storage: Used to transmit and receive the stored files with wearable devices
Telephone: Used to check device-unique identification information for updating apps and installing plugin apps
Contacts: Used to provide services that need to be linked with accounts using registered Samsung account information
Galaxy Wearable uses the Location permission to use Bluetooth to search for nearby devices.
Used to identify devices for updating apps and installing plugins.
"To use Galaxy Wearable, you need to allow it to access this phone's precise location."
"See %1$spermissions for Galaxy Wearable%2$s and how they're used."
Unable to use %s. Tap SETTINGS, then allow the following permissions and try again:
Used to scan for nearby devices.
Bluetooth is turned off. Tap Turn on to turn it on.
Connect your Galaxy watch, band, or buds.
Samsung Accessory Service has been updated. Restart your phone to connect to your Gear.
To pair your watch with your new phone, first reset your watch, then open Galaxy Wearable and connect.
To connect to a new phone, you need to reset your watch first, which will delete all data.
Connect your watch to your new phone?
Send a system log to help resolve your questions.

"To complete the following required functions, we will collect the sensitive personal data specified below:
To listen to the Voice of the Customer and provide you with services, we will collect your Samsung account information.
If you don’t provide us with the sensitive personal data specified above or disagree with our collection and use of such data, the product (or service) won’t function correctly and we will not be able to provide you with the service. Visit https://account.samsung.com/membership/pp at any time and read our Privacy Policy.
By checking the confirmation box, you acknowledge and agree to our collection and use of your sensitive personal data."
Use of sensitive personal data for required functions
Swipe up or down with two fingers to scroll.
"Can't attach more than %s of files. Remove some files and try again."

Your system log will be sent to Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd for analysis. Your system log may contain information from the third-party apps installed on your phone. The system log data will only be used to analyze the problem and improve the app, then deleted as soon as the analysis is complete. Sending your system log using mobile data will increase your data usage by up to %s and may result in additional charges. You can use Wi-Fi" instead.
Wait for the system log to be attached before writing the details of your problem."

"For our global service and management purposes, we may transfer personal data, such as your Samsung account, device information, logs, and information you submit regarding inquiries, to the Republic of Korea. It is possible that the data protection measures and other laws set forth in the country or region to which your personal data is transferred may not be as complete as the ones available in the country or region where you reside. However, we guarantee that your personal data will receive the same level of protection as it does in the country or region where you reside. You may visit https://account.samsung.com/membership/pp at any time and read our Privacy Policy. Please specify whether you agree to the transfer of your personal data abroad."
Tap Settings and turn on Location to connect to your watch and sync data.
"If you don't update now, you can't continue to use the Galaxy Wearable app."
To set up your watch, you need to update Google Play services first, then start setup again.
On the Apps screen, Tap Settings > Connect to new phone.
